Attribute.Name: Password
Attribute.Description: The password to be stored in the database. If this attribute is empty or missing, default encryption logic will be used to store the password.

Attribute.Name: Salt
Attribute.Description: Value of the associated Salt (if any) used to hash the password. This same value will be passed to the YCPCheckPasswordsMatchUE UserExit as needed. If the Password attribute is not returned, then this attribute has no effect, and should not be returned either.
